entries.femaleVariant: Whaddup, Night City! Bet you're all still reeling from that botched All Foods robbery over in Watson. And if you haven't seen it, feast your optics on this!
The moves on this girl! Swoosh, swoosh... slicin' 'em up like sashimi!
Now, a lot of you called in asking what kinda edge she's packin'.
Your girl Karina here got a mighty enhanced look, and I'm almost one hundred percent positive they're Daikon Nt Mantis Blades by Arasaka.
Perfect for those who put personal safety first... not to mention discreet, too.
Look, we all know Arasaka chips all its employees mid-level and up with these bad-boys. They even throw in their high-sensitivity, automatic defense reflexes for good measure.
But you don't need to be some blue-chipped corpo to flash this kinda tech. The Daikon Nt Mantis Blades are available for every ordinary Night Citizen... long as they got deep pockets.
Thanks for tunin' in today, my chooms. And remember to keep on chippin' in!
